text:
SOS SourceOffSite is an add-on to SourceSafe that allows remote
access & Unix connectivity to VSS.

I have written a set of tasks to handle the common operations
Get File/Project, Checkout File/Project, Checkin File/Project, Label
The task along with test cases & patches for cvs can be found here
http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=ant-dev&m=101180722419167&q=p3

There seems to be interest in SOS support in Ant

I have sent my tasks to a handful of others & there was a previous discussion
about SOS on ant-dev. http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=ant-dev&m=98537619525539&w=2

Jesse
creator: jesse@cryptocard.com
sbailliez@apache.org
text:
I believe we can switch this one to fixed since it is now in CVS ?
Thanks for everything Jesse.
